title: Productivity Tuesday Ep#4 -- Authy Two Factor Authentication
tags: how to setup authy for the first time
description:
In this video, We have discussed Authy -- the popular two-factor authentication app.

How to setup Authy  2:32
How to add Google Account to Authy 4:08

Dropbox
Facebook
Microsoft account
GitHub
Teamviewer
Kickstarter
IFTTT
Discord
EA Origin account
Discord
Patreon
LastPass
Humble Bundle
Twitch
Evernote
